mapper.select: select menu, count(menu) count, sale_date from sale where sale_date = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') group by menu order by count desc limit 5
select sale_date, sum(sale_Price) sale_Price from sale where sale_date between date_sub(now(), interval 7 day) and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') group by sale_date order by sale_date;
